title: Is homogenized cow's milk good or bad for human consumption? - Quora

response.answer_text: All milk, from whatever animal, is unnatural for human consumption. As milk's composition is based on raising an offspring of the same type as the mother. it is unlikely to be a healthy choice, in particular after the weaning process, when the production of lactase has ceased.

Homogenization is just a technical term for the physical process of mixing the whole batch of milk, to maintain a fairly uniform milk product (in terms of specs of fat and milk solids) from the first bottle output, to the last one. So don't worry. Drink all you want;-)
